wikipedia_page.main: Evelyn Victoria Ann Tate (née Chandler) (1887 – 1979) known by her stage name Eva Carrington, was an actress, model and sometime peeress as the wife of the Baron de Clifford.

response: Lieutenant Colonel Edward Southwell Russell, 26th Baron de Clifford,  (31 January 1907 – 3 January 1982), was the only son of Jack Southwell Russell, 25th Baron de Clifford, and Eva Carrington.
Eva Carrington – Evelyn Victoria Anne Chandler
He married the actress Evelyn Victoria Anne Chandler, known as Eva Carrington, on 16 February 1906 at the St. Pancras Registry Office.
